page.title: 18DOMESDAY GROUP AND ITS FOOD
page.content: THE DOMESDAY GROUP DECIDED TO SURVEY ITS EATING HABITS. WE SURVEYED BREAKFAST, LUNCH & OUR FAVOURITE FOOD. BREAKFAST:- NOBODY HAD A COOKED BREAKFAST. HALF HAD CEREAL(ESPECIALLY CORNFLAKES),SOME HAD TOAST WITH TEA OR COFFEE. TWO HAD NOTHING. LUNCH:- ONLY A FEW WENT HOME. ONE BROUGHT A PACKED LUNCH; THE REST HAD SCHOOL DINNERS. MOST SCHOOL DINNERS CONSISTED OF HAMBURGER ROLLS WITH CHIPS, CRISPS AND JUICE. THE OTHER USUAL CHOICE WAS FILLED ROLLS. FAVOURITE FOOD:- OUR FIRST CHOICE WAS CHICKEN. 50% OF US HAD IT WITH FRIED RICE, DONE EITHER CHINESE OR INDIAN STYLE. MINCE WAS NEXT, EITHER AS 'MINCE & TATTIES', BEEFBURGERS OR SPAGHETTI BOLOGNAISE. OTHER CHOICES WERE LIVER, SCAMPI AND BATTENBURG CAKE COKE WAS THE FAVOURITE DRINK.
